entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
